about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Web Developer specializing in React.js and Python, with hands-on experience building and deploying web applications. Led the development of LIQUIBOXES, an innovative e-commerce platform, and contributed to multiple team projects including YO LO CUIDO.
about.description_2: My background in Mechanical Engineering enhances my approach to problem-solving and system architecture. Currently established in Dublin, I combine technical expertise with strong communication skills in English, Spanish, and Portuguese.
about.description_3: Seeking to join a dynamic tech company where I can contribute to impactful projects while continuing to grow as a developer.

job1.title: Full Stack Developer & Team Lead
job1.description: Leading a team of 3 developers in building an innovative e-commerce platform. Architected and implemented the full solution using React.js and Python/Flask. Key achievements include: implementing secure payment processing with Stripe, designing an efficient database structure with SQLAlchemy, and establishing an agile development workflow. The project was recognized as the best project at 4Geeks Academy.

job2.title: Frontend Developer
job2.description: Developed the frontend for YO LO CUIDO, a pet care services platform. Implemented responsive UI components using React and modern CSS practices. Collaborated with UX/UI team to ensure pixel-perfect implementation of designs. Optimized application performance and implemented user authentication system.

job3.title: R&D&I Project Consultant
job3.description: Specialized in analyzing innovative technology projects, focusing on IT, video games, and animation development. This role sparked my passion for software development through deep exposure to cutting-edge technologies and development methodologies. Analyzed complex software architectures, collaborated with tech companies, and gained valuable insights into modern development practices that inspired my transition into full-stack development.

project1.title: LIQUIBOXES
project1.description: Led the development of an innovative e-commerce platform that revolutionizes inventory management through personalized mystery boxes. Built with React.js, Python/Flask, and PostgreSQL. Features secure payment processing (Stripe), real-time inventory management, and an advanced recommendation system. Implemented CI/CD pipeline and conducted code reviews using GitHub Actions.

project2.title: YO LO CUIDO
project2.description: Developed a responsive pet care services platform connecting pet owners with caregivers. Built the frontend using React with modern practices including custom hooks and context API. Implemented user authentication, real-time notifications, and an intuitive booking system. Collaborated with backend team for seamless API integration.

project3.title: Star Wars Database
project3.description: Created an interactive web application showcasing Star Wars universe data using React and Redux. Implemented features like dynamic search, favorites system, and detailed character profiles. Utilized the SWAPI REST API and implemented efficient data caching for optimal performance.
